title: Shattered Relics League glitch

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Shattered Relics League glitch was a major glitch that occurred on 19 January 2022. With the release of Shattered Relics League, there were problems with player profiles. Some players lost their Ironman Mode status upon logging back into the main game after logging into a Shattered Relics League world, and some players had their main game items and stats transferred over to their Shattered Relics League profile.

content:
The Shattered Relics League glitch was a major glitch that occurred on 19 January 2022. With the release of Shattered Relics League, there were problems with player profiles. Some players lost their Ironman Mode status upon logging back into the main game after logging into a Shattered Relics League world, and some players had their main game items and stats transferred over to their Shattered Relics League profile.

Jagex turned the game offline around an hour after the update to perform a rollback.[1] The rollback only affected main game profiles and not Shattered Relics.[2]

Several hours after the update, Jagex acknowledged the rollback had caused some Group Ironman Mode shared storage items to have been deleted.[3]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. 19 January 2022. (Archived from the original on 8 April 2022.) Old School RuneScape: "Due to issues with League save profiles, we are going to be shutting the game down very shortly. Unfortunately, we are required to perform a rollback to just before the launch of Leagues III. Apologies for the inconvenience and we will update you with more information soon."
  2. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. 19 January 2022. (Archived from the original on 8 April 2022.) Old School RuneScape: "We've identified that the rollback will only be required for main game progress, setting players back to just before the update. The Hiscores for Leagues will be reset, but all progress made on a Leagues world will be available when the game is back online."
  3. ^ Jagex. Old School RuneScape's Twitter account. 19 January 2022. (Archived from the original on 8 April 2022.) Old School RuneScape: "Following the rollback that was performed earlier today, some items from Group Storage have been lost. We are currently investigating potential solutions and identifying those who may have been affected."
